entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Cambridge Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:31 PM MST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -38.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cambridge Bay Airport 3:00 PM MST Saturday 11 February 2023
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -38.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa falling
Visibility: 9.7 km
Humidity: 65 %
Wind Chill: -50
Dewpoint: -42.4°C
Wind: NE 12 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 40.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this evening. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h early this evening. Low minus 40. Wind chill near minus 56. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 37.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud late in the morning. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 37. Wind chill near minus 53. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Saturday 11 February 2023
